Cosmic Baby did the best techno remix of The Bladerunner theme.  Its not cheesy or goofed up with too many drum beats like most techno versions, but just right, elegant and a very serious composition.  Its very rare though, good luck finding it!
Superb! Thank you very much. But...how about a loseless version? PLEASEEEE!
